PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02832018-03-12CH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARK L. BERLIN of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 1, 2018, in the place of Lisa M. Pankratz, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
